title: How to Find and Install New Apps on KaiOS

steps.title: Connect your KaiOS phone to the internet.
steps.content: Connect your KaiOS phone to the internet. As long as your phone is online using your mobile data plan or through a wireless network, you'll be able to download apps from the KaiStore. Wi-Fi: Open your Settings , select Wi-Fi , and then tap to turn it on. Select the network you want to join and enter the password if required. When Wi-Fi is active, the wireless symbol (a cone made of curved lines ) will appear at the top of the screen. Mobile data: Open your Settings , select Mobile Network , and then tap to turn it on. When mobile data is active, a "3G" or "4G" will appear at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Go to the home screen and press the center key.
steps.content: Go to the home screen and press the center key. Your phone's app list will expand.

steps.title: Scroll to the KaiStore icon and press the center key.
steps.content: Scroll to the KaiStore icon and press the center key. The icon is a briefcase containing a "K" made of multicolored shapes. If you're located in India and using a Jio-branded phone, you'll need to select the JioStore instead. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select an app category.
steps.content: Select an app category. Apps on the KaiStore are separated into categories for easy browsing. Use the arrow keys to scroll to the desired category, and then press the center key to see the list of apps. Check out the Recommended category to learn about new and trending apps.

steps.title: Select an app to learn more about it.
steps.content: Select an app to learn more about it. Pressing the center key on an app will display the app's information, including a summary of what the app is all about. Use the arrow keys to scroll up and down through the information as needed. If you select an app you've already installed and there's a newer version available, you'll see an "Update" option on the info page. Press the center key to run the update.

steps.title: Press the center key to download the app.
steps.content: Press the center key to download the app. The app will install on your phone. When the installation is complete, a success message will appear. A new icon will also be added to your app list.

steps.title: Press the center key to open the app.
steps.content: Press the center key to open the app. You can also open the app by selecting its icon on your app list.
